snippet: “Eden as We Recall,” a dance about space by Stacy Spence, was performed at Danspace Project as part of the Platform 2012: Judson Now series.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premiere of Stacy Spence dance piece Eden as We Recall, performed at Danspace Project as part of its Platform 2012: Judson Now series.
lead_paragraph: “Eden as We Recall,” a dance about space by Stacy Spence, was performed at Danspace Project as part of the Platform 2012: Judson Now series.

headline.seo: ‘Eden as We Recall,’ by Stacy Spence, at Danspace Project
headline.main: A Delicate Partnership With a Room
headline.print_headline: A Delicate Partnership With a Room
